headline: How AT&T's (T) Nationwide Mid-Band 5G Rollout Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: AT&T recently completed the coast-to-coast deployment of mid-band 5G spectrum, acquired from EchoStar, into nearly 23,000 cell sites, significantly increasing download speeds and enhancing network capacity for both wireless and home internet customers across over 5,300 cities in 48 states. This rapid integration not only expands AT&T's service coverage and quality, but could also reinforce its competitive position by supporting efficient growth, improving operational efficiency, and driving...
